Attribute.Name: ListLinesWithException
Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether to give only those move request lines which has exceptions.

Description.div:
Primary key attribute of YFS_MOVE_REQUEST table.
Either primary key (MoveRequestKey) or all attributes of unique key (MoveRequestNo and Node) must be passed. Error if MoveRequestKey is passed but not exist in the database.

MoveRequestNo identifies a move request within the context of an activity group for a node. This is the unique key of the YFS_Move_Request entity.
Either primary key (MoveRequestKey) or all attributes of unique key (MoveRequestNo and Node) must be passed. Error if MoveRequestNo is not passed alongwith Node.
Either primary key (MoveRequestKey) or all attributes of unique key (MoveRequestNo and Node) must be passed. Error if Move request for the MoveRequestNo does not exist in the database.

This is the Node where move request would be executed. It is the primary key attribute of the YFS_SHIP_NODE table.
Either primary key (MoveRequestKey) or all attributes of unique key (MoveRequestNo and Node) must be passed. Error if Node is not passed alongwith MoveRequestNo.
Either primary key (MoveRequestKey) or all attributes of unique key (MoveRequestNo and Node) must be passed. Error if Move request for the Node does not exist in the database.
